entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
